testcase.classname: As a Product owner if there is no amount entered and the convert button is clicked then i want to see an error message.

testcase.classname: As a Product owner i want the feature to Convert Currancy A to B and versa with the currancy converter
testcase.name: Click Convert with out entering Amount
testcase.skipped: Given I am on the home page on URL "https://westpac.co.nz"..................undefined And Navigate to FX, travel & migrant and Click Currency Converter Btn.......undefined And Select "New Zealand Dollar" from Convert from drop down.................undefined And Enter 1 in Amount field.................................................undefined And Select "United States Dollar" from Convert to drop down.................undefined When Click Convert Btn......................................................undefined And Check success message "User is able convert 1 USD to NZD successfully"..undefined And Select "United States Dollar" from Convert from drop down...............undefined And Enter 1 in Amount field.................................................undefined And Select "New Zealand Dollar" from Convert to drop down...................undefined When Click Convert Btn......................................................undefined And Check success message "User is able convert 1 NZD to USD successfully"..undefined And Select "Pound Sterling" from Convert from drop down.....................undefined And Enter 1 in Amount field.................................................undefined And Select "New Zealand Dollar" from Convert to drop down...................undefined When Click Convert Btn......................................................undefined And Check success message "User is able convert 1 Pound Sterling to NZD successfully".undefined And Select "Swiss Franc" from Convert from drop down........................undefined And Enter 1 in Amount field.................................................undefined And Select "Euro" from Convert to drop down.................................undefined When Click Convert Btn......................................................undefined And Check success message "User is able convert 1 Swiss Franc to Euro successfully".undefined
